title: Buffalo shooter let some people see plans just before attack - The Associated Press
content:
1. Buffalo shooter let some people see plans just before attack  The Associated Press
  2. Buffalo mass shooting suspect wore hazmat suit to school once in-person learning resumed  Fox News
  3. Messages appear to show Buffalo supermarket shooting suspect's months of planning  CBS Mornings
  4. Alleged Buffalo shooter Payton Gendron's plans were shared online 30 minutes before deadly racist attack: report  New York Post
  5. Man charged in Buffalo massacre due back in court  KSNF/KODE - FourStatesHomepage.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Shortly before he opened fire, the white gunman accused of killing 10 Black people  at a Buffalo, New York, supermarket allowed a small group of people to see his detailed plans for the attack, which he had been chronicling for months in a private, online diary.
